document.body:
Listopia
Almost as good a way to waste your time at work as having a leisurely shit.
Lists Profile
Recent Entries
Last Famous Words Best Ever TV Themes You still would Celebrity Halloween Costumes Improving Prometheus Listopian quotations Impossible Tasks I mean, France is alright...BUT: More Lists... Random Imma do dis, and Imma not even kidding actually. Login
Signing up means you can add to lists, have bold and unabashed opinions, chat to people, draw monochrome doodles, and create your own lists. It could be a wonderful list. Or it could be that list of funny things to do in a lift that's been knocking around the internet for 19 years. The balls are literally in your court and mouth. Fine, Hand Me The Clipboard
404 List Not Found
Either you asked for an invalid list, or no list at all
